data.text:
Reverse Retro games aren’t limited to the team.

Our ice crew, @VictorEGreen, and @StarsIceGirls get in the 90’s spirit, too! ⭐️ https://t.co/zaxAtcnuYY
RT @Guitarslayer24: Awesome moment today. Thank you @dallasstars ! Cheers to the “W”

Truly a big day for big Mush 👏

@trulyseltzer | #TexasHockey https://t.co/hCmv127Dzk

"We didn't have many passengers tonight. I thought everyone showed up and played hard."

@ATT | #TexasHockey https://t.co/UCiXqeU8bc

"I try to do my best and perform out there... Great play by Mush and happy with two points!"

@ATT | #TexasHockey https://t.co/iszGkJCg1u

"We were patient, we got our chance, and we finished it."

@ATT | #TexasHockey https://t.co/pmKBdZxK9M

"I'm just trying to play my best game."

@ATT | #TexasHockey https://t.co/MEbriERLqg
Mmm... piece-a piece-a https://t.co/G3uq2KQyCq
https://t.co/RHawZ5DXUf
Current mood. 😄 https://t.co/qZJzVZTxKG

WHAT A GAME WINNER FROM MUSH AND NILS!

📺: @BallySportsSW | #TexasHockey https://t.co/FakzDfFFfK

Let's get this show on the road!

@Lexus | #TexasHockey https://t.co/jAMKFtxPxY

THAT'S OUR SWEET SWEDE! 🇸🇪

@Toyota | #TexasHockey https://t.co/NXsMcCkETw

STARS WIN!

@BudLight | #BudLightCelly | #TexasHockey https://t.co/gn0G4Qij9l

Here we go again.

@Lexus | #TexasHockey https://t.co/3oiL8rTYID
@Canucks We think they all should win
Let's see if this will work 🤗 https://t.co/DVf7uOnClp
Big 3rd time! https://t.co/zYbWQ4oEH6

That kinda day, huh?

@Lexus | #TexasHockey https://t.co/fY8F7vLZay

The Robo and the Cap. 

📺: @BallySportsSW | #TexasHockey https://t.co/2EjxMm949R

CAP GETS IT GOING!

@TXUEnergy | #TexasHockey https://t.co/eNwcZdzDaP

Festive. 🎄

Let's spice it up in the 2nd! 🌶 https://t.co/DsvPgdP1e7

Let's ROCK! 🤘

What an anthem by @Guitarslayer24 👏🎸🇺🇸 https://t.co/wPWbW5Yhyv

Perfect feed, perfect poke. 🤩

data.text:

RULES: https://t.co/mdlarr9WMJ

Saturday matinee 📺

@barzillier Look, we can’t get every guy every game
299 games into his @NHL career, Miro Heiskanen's offensive game is catching up to his defensive maturity.
@senturboaika Roope, Jamie, Gury, Robo and Nils, Roope
@texas4ever25 We just tweet
@AvalancheHeart We will accept anything but decaf
@StarsCountdown Yes
@barzillier We dare you.
@Why_SoSerious12 Can confirm
Send coffee. ☕ https://t.co/T6KliaFPUX
@air_smith @AACenter @BallySportsSW @dfwticket @Toyota THAT IS A GREAT REASON TO MISS A HOME GAME! Congrats!!
@BertStranding Today and our game on Dec 23 are the final reverse retro games of the season.
@houseofsham YES
#NewProfilePic 🔀 https://t.co/R2b22S5vgY
@BattyJamie24 @squatchdaddy We think they'll enjoy #TexasHockey🥰

Let's close out this homestand! 🙌

🆚 Detroit Red Wings
⏰ 1:00pm
📍 @AACenter 
📺 @BallySportsSW 
📻 @dfwticket 

@Toyota | #TexasHockey https://t.co/oiYkikpDVt
@annieloves73 👀
@klarissamoraIes @charlsie_floyd @madisonrileee Okay ladies!!! We'll see y'all again soon!
@soonerfan432 We'll see y'all REAL soon!
@cfraze3 @tseguinofficial @VictorEGreen Yes!!!! We love this!
@StarsCountdown Uh oh
Who’s bringing a friend to their first Stars game this season? 👀 https://t.co/Mv9JaPeAKC
@28Meier @tb6___ Okay 🙂

Due to expected inclement weather, please bring your donations tomorrow to the Jack Daniel's Lounge covered patio on the southeast corner of @AACenter on Houston St. 

Robo's Holiday Toy Drive donations will be collected between 11:30am and the end of the first period.

Nothing better than that Friday feeling 🫂

@bswhealth | #TexasHockey https://t.co/qUO8yNnvA7

"Our 3rd was our best. We won an OT game. Tyler Seguin got a goal... Otter had a really solid game... There was some good things that came out of it despite the first 40 minutes."

@ATT | #TexasHockey https://t.co/fHnBMICS1I

"That goal was because of [Wyatt Johnston]. It was an unbelievable play... He's earned it."

@ATT | #TexasHockey https://t.co/bjVAzK1v0w

"It's always fun to score. I like to score."

@ATT | #TexasHockey https://t.co/NOZZiYFXC5

Last night, Sergeant First Class Jesus Hernandez joined us for our @Boeing Military Salute 🇺🇸

A Bronze Star and Purple Heart recipient for his heroic actions, SFC Hernandez now serves as an ROTC Military Science Instructor at @TCU.

We thank you for your service, SFC Hernandez! https://t.co/IbAHsvhI3l

Yeah, Tyler won it, but did you see what Wyatt did to set him up?

@ATT | #TexasHockey https://t.co/BrI1U48nef

Miro, our hero! 

@trulyseltzer | #TexasHockey https://t.co/CLkUjxUYNo
RT @StarCenters: Amazing feature on our very own Allysen Weidner - We are lucky to have you to help grow the sport of hockey in Dallas! @Da…
@sighsamuel @7eleven You good, Sam?

CAN WE GET A "LET'S GOOOOO"?!

@7eleven | #TexasHockey https://t.co/6DFXTECvYv
@WilllMoore LET’S GO!!! We hope to see you back here soon, Will!
@IIoucy @chelseaax16 The one who won. Goodnight.
@REALJackTheBus Photoshop was brutes tonight
@avsbrainrot @AvalancheHeart Good night.
We see your tweets.
https://t.co/6BBVB4uNLI

We enjoyed the ending to that game.

@Lexus | #TexasHockey https://t.co/W3JTG5UJuF
Game winning assist machine, Wyatt Johnston. https://t.co/AKiJksZgsM
And, breathe! 👐 https://t.co/FU9pqEkAfm

Seggy sealed it!!

@Toyota | #TexasHockey https://t.co/RrC8P21rTT

@Lexus | #TexasHockey https://t.co/jXp5MYlZqf

WHAT?! 

¡¿QUÉ?!

A fan favourite returns 🐾🏁

The #Canucks Dog Race will happen during the 2nd intermission of tomorrow’s game against the Wild. 

The contestants:
• Delilah Demko
• Huxley Dermott
• Sasha Mikheyev
• Bodhi Martin
• Flower Bear
